mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.qikanxinxi_id as qikanxinxiId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,qikanxinxi.qikanxinxi_name as qikanxinxiName ,qikanxinxi.qikanxinxi_file as qikanxinxiFile ,qikanxinxi.qikanxinxi_photo as qikanxinxiPhoto ,qikanxinxi.qikanxinxi_content as qikanxinxiContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.new_money as newMoney ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM liulanjil a left JOIN qikanxinxi qikanxinxi ON a.qikanxinxi_id = qikanxinxi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.qikanxinxi_id = #{params.qikanxinxiId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.qikanxinxi_id IS NOT NULL
and qikanxinxi.qikanxinxi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.qikanxinxiName},'%')
and qikanxinxi.zazhixinxi_id = #{params.zazhixinxiId}
and qikanxinxi.qikanxinxi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.qikanxinxiContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(qikanxinxi.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(qikanxinxi.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.new_money >= #{params.newMoneyStart}
and yonghu.new_money <= #{params.newMoneyEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
